summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 18207, entitled "An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Forty (40.00) Dollars out of the sub-sewer deposit fund of the former City of Ballard, to be paid into the Local Improvement Fund of District No. 1630, as a credit on the assessment of said district against Lot One (1), Block Fifty-eight (58), Gilman Park Addition", approved April 10th, 1908.
